title: 就是那个拉方块的
author: 夜神月
txt_content: 就是这里点一下，然后那里点一下。中间就出现方块。把这两个点的空地填充的那个。怎么搞？？

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 well 于 2011-6-18 11:48 编辑 

WorldEdit 
單機要搭配 Single Player Commands 使用
http://www.sk89q.com/projects/worldedit/

論壇的帖子:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-5019-1-1.html

搬運帖有最新版下載:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-5346-1-1.html

replies.author: hhyx
replies.txt_content: 不装WorldEditCUI是看不到‘拉方块’的效果的

replies.author: 夜神月
replies.txt_content: 把空气全部变为石头的呢？还有WorldEditCUI在哪里下？

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content: 就是 Worldedit Client-side Interface ,搬運帖裡也有...

replies.txt_content:
